content: This is it right here. You know that feeling when you’ve finally seen a friend or family member after a decent span of time, and because of that distance and time, you can see how much that other person has grown and changed? That’s how I’ve been feeling reading your latest pieces Tre. Reading this particular piece felt like sitting across from you and listening to your story. It’s beautiful in its raw strength mixed with fragility. I love this. I felt this.
